name: Potato
appearance_when_healthy: Green leaves with no spots or discoloration. Firm, smooth, and undamaged tubers.
maintenance_instructions: Requires well-drained soil, moderate water, and full sunlight. Avoid overwatering and ensure good air circulation around plants.
optimal_conditions: Cool climate with temperatures between 15-20°C. Soil should be loose, fertile, and slightly acidic (pH 5.5-6.5).
growth_stages: Planting, Vegetative growth, Tuber formation, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Rich in carbohydrates, vitamin C, and potassium. Great source of energy and essential nutrients.

name: Tomato
appearance_when_healthy: Bright green, firm leaves with no yellowing. Red, smooth fruits without wrinkles or spots.
maintenance_instructions: Prefers full sunlight and well-drained soil. Needs regular watering and occasional pruning to prevent overcrowding.
optimal_conditions: Warm climate (20-30°C). Well-drained, slightly acidic soil (pH 6.0-6.8).
growth_stages: Germination, Seedling, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: High in antioxidants, vitamin C, and lycopene. Helps boost the immune system and improve heart health.

name: Pumpkin
appearance_when_healthy: Bright green leaves, sturdy vines, and orange pumpkins with smooth skin and no spots.
maintenance_instructions: Requires full sunlight and well-drained soil. Needs ample space for vine growth and moderate watering to prevent drying out.
optimal_conditions: Warm weather (25-30°C) with plenty of sunlight. Soil should be rich in organic matter, well-drained, and slightly acidic (pH 6.0-6.8).
growth_stages: Germination, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Good source of vitamin A, fiber, and potassium. Promotes eye health and supports digestive function.

name: Sugarcane
appearance_when_healthy: Tall, green, and healthy stalks with no yellowing or browning.
maintenance_instructions: Requires warm climate, fertile soil, and regular irrigation. Keep soil moist but not waterlogged.
optimal_conditions: Tropical climate with temperatures between 20-30°C. Requires well-drained soil rich in organic matter.
growth_stages: Germination, Vegetative growth, Tillering, Maturation, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Rich in sugar, fiber, and antioxidants. Supports energy production and digestive health.

name: Rice
appearance_when_healthy: Bright green leaves, firm stems, and no discoloration in the grains.
maintenance_instructions: Prefers a flooded field (paddy) with warm weather and adequate sunlight. Needs consistent water supply.
optimal_conditions: Tropical and subtropical climate. Requires temperatures of 22-30°C and waterlogged soil.
growth_stages: Germination, Seedling, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Maturation, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Rich in carbohydrates and essential vitamins. A staple food providing energy and nutrients.

name: Apple
appearance_when_healthy: Green leaves, bright red or green fruit with no bruises or blemishes.
maintenance_instructions: Requires well-drained soil and full sunlight. Needs regular watering, but avoid overwatering to prevent root rot.
optimal_conditions: Cool climate (15-24°C) with well-drained, slightly acidic soil (pH 6.0-6.8).
growth_stages: Planting, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: High in fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidants. Supports heart health and promotes healthy digestion.

name: Wheat
appearance_when_healthy: Tall, green, and upright plants with no yellowing or wilting.
maintenance_instructions: Prefers cool weather and well-drained soil. Needs consistent watering during germination and tillering.
optimal_conditions: Cool climate (15-20°C). Well-drained soil with a pH of 6.0-7.0.
growth_stages: Germination, Seedling, Tillering, Jointing, Heading, Maturation, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Rich in fiber, B vitamins, and iron. Helps in weight management and promotes digestive health.

name: Cotton
appearance_when_healthy: Green leaves and cotton bolls that are fluffy, white, and undamaged.
maintenance_instructions: Requires a warm climate, full sunlight, and regular watering to prevent drought stress.
optimal_conditions: Hot climate (25-35°C). Soil should be light, well-drained, and slightly alkaline (pH 7.0-7.5).
growth_stages: Germination, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Used for textile production and contains trace amounts of oil. Helps in fabric production and agriculture.

name: Cucumber
appearance_when_healthy: Vibrant green leaves with crisp, smooth, and unblemished cucumbers.
maintenance_instructions: Needs moderate water, full sunlight, and well-drained soil. Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy.
optimal_conditions: Warm climate (22-30°C) with plenty of sunlight. Soil should be rich in organic matter, well-drained, and slightly acidic (pH 6.0-6.8).
growth_stages: Germination, Seedling, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Low in calories, high in water content, and a good source of vitamin K. Supports hydration and skin health.

name: Pomegranate
appearance_when_healthy: Bright green leaves with vibrant red flowers and smooth, rounded fruits with no cracks.
maintenance_instructions: Requires well-drained soil, full sunlight, and moderate watering. Allow the soil to dry slightly between waterings.
optimal_conditions: Warm climate (20-30°C) with full sunlight. Soil should be slightly acidic (pH 6.0-7.0) and well-drained.
growth_stages: Germination, Seedling, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Rich in antioxidants, vitamin C, and fiber. Promotes heart health and reduces inflammation.

name: Guava
appearance_when_healthy: Bright green leaves, strong stems, and smooth, ripe fruits with no dark spots.
maintenance_instructions: Prefers warm climates, full sunlight, and regular watering. Keep soil slightly moist but not waterlogged.
optimal_conditions: Tropical climate (22-30°C). Soil should be well-drained and slightly acidic (pH 5.5-6.5).
growth_stages: Germination, Seedling, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: High in vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants. Supports immune health and digestive function.

name: Grapes
appearance_when_healthy: Green, well-formed leaves with large, plump grapes on strong vines.
maintenance_instructions: Requires full sunlight, well-drained soil, and regular pruning to maintain vine health and promote fruiting.
optimal_conditions: Warm climate (25-30°C) with plenty of sunlight. Soil should be well-drained, slightly acidic (pH 6.0-6.5).
growth_stages: Germination, Vegetative growth, Flowering, Fruiting, Harvesting.
key_benefits: Rich in antioxidants, vitamin C, and potassium. Supports cardiovascular health and enhances skin health.
